WorkItem.Description:
1) Build upgrade list (full thoroughness)
2) Notice Power Generator Hood (59219) is not on the list.
3) Make Power Generator Hood available on the gear/head list.
4) Optimize
5) Optimizer will find score of 18338 (from 18315), equipping Power Generator Hood, a 23dps increase.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer.UL] Upgrade list not thorough, missing item(s)

Comments.Message:
For Higher Thoroughness (10x whatever the slider says), use Ctrl+Click on the button



** Closed by Jothay 2/28/2011 12:29 PM
Does 10x Higher Thoroughness work on Build Upgrade List? I don't think it does. Ctrl+Click build takes about the same time as a regular build.

Build Upgrade List and Optimize don't use the same scale for thoroughness in the main optimize screen. There used to be an old bug report for this already but it's probably been closed. I think the main motivation for that was to make both correspond to roughly the same time spent on the action, although I don't think that was the right decision.

For a workaround you can load that single character in batch tools and use build upgrade list from there, batch tools uses the same thoroughness scale for all actions.
Implemented the 10x Ctrl Click on UL button too
